医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
限制屏幕时间并尽早返回学校可能会加速脑震荡后的康复全国儿童医院的研究人员发现，在脑震荡恢复方面，活动类型很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Limiting-screen-time-and-returning-to-school-early-may-speed-up-recovery-after-a-concussion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Limiting-screen-time-and-returning-to-school-early-may-speed-up-recovery-after-a-concussion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f828caf-0dd8-4c04-aa6f-49cadef6ccda Mon, 12 Feb 2024 13:07:58 -0500 Limiting screen time and returning to school early may speed up recovery after a concussion
印第安纳大学研究人员开发出一种突破性的新精神分裂症血液测试由印第安纳大学医学院教师领导的一组研究人员开发了一种突破性的新血液检测方法，用于治疗精神分裂症，这是一种包括幻觉和妄想在内的精神疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/IU-researchers-develop-a-breakthrough-new-blood-test-for-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/IU-researchers-develop-a-breakthrough-new-blood-test-for-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78f25a52-d2b7-405d-92e8-3692eade3ac8 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 12:43:46 -0500 IU researchers develop a breakthrough new blood test for schizophrenia
研究发现勃起功能障碍药物可降低阿尔茨海默病风险研究人员评估了患有勃起功能障碍的男性中开始使用磷酸二酯酶 5 抑制剂 (PDE5I) 与不使用磷酸二酯酶 5 抑制剂 (PDE5I) 的效果以及患阿尔茨海默病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-finds-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-linked-to-lower-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-finds-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-linked-to-lower-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=104e9cb7-1232-4c75-a1a2-8b94befab7c6 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 12:23:00 -0500 Study finds erectile dysfunction drugs linked to lower Alzheimer's risk
孕妇超加工食品消费与邻苯二甲酸盐暴露之间的关联研究人员探讨了怀孕期间食用超加工食品与尿邻苯二甲酸盐浓度之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Associations- Between-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-and-phalate-exposures-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Associations- Between-ultra-processed-food-conspiration-and-phalate-exposures-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b12e7781-a942-4542-8922-59e0773a5d9f Mon, 12 Feb 2024 12:04:00 -0500 Associations between ultra-processed food consumption and phthalate exposures in pregnant women
突破性的研究表明单核细胞在压力下迁移到大脑的情绪中心研究人员报告了一种机制，其中外周免疫因素可能会影响压力下中枢神经系统（CNS）的功能和行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Groundwriting-study-shows-monologies-migrate-to-brains-emotional-centers-during-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Groundwriting-study-shows-monologies-migrate-to-brains-emotional-centers-during-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20664a19-852b-49e9-8e0e-f327386568c5 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:40:00 -0500 Groundbreaking study shows monocytes migrate to brain's emotional centers during stress
PulmoBioMed 筹集 140 万英镑用于创新肺部测试商业化PulmoBioMed 是诺森比亚大学的一家衍生公司，它开发了一种新的肺部测试，可以帮助早期诊断哮喘和其他疾病。PulmoBioMed 已筹集 140 万英镑以帮助其技术商业化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/PulmoBioMed-raises-c2a314m-for-innovative-lung-test-commercialization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/PulmoBioMed-raises-c2a314m-for-innovative-lung-test-commercialization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c346c93-a9f8-4ed3-a075-9da353139829 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:25:13 -0500 PulmoBioMed raises £1.4m for innovative lung test commercialization
研究可能会带来用于早期检测皮肤状况的非侵入性光技术阿斯顿大学研究人员进行的一项研究表明，在偏振激光下检查时，老化皮肤的外观与年轻皮肤相比明显不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-could-lead-to-non-induced-light-based-techniques-for-early-detection-of-skin-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Study-could-lead-to-non-induced-light-based-techniques-for-early-detection-of-skin-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f9fe0f6-391a-4732-8b69-a61fc37a5eef Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:17:46 -0500 Study could lead to non-invasive, light-based techniques for early detection of skin conditions
试验调查在线监督团体精神和身体康复计划对长期新冠患者的疗效研究人员评估了在线监督的团体精神和身体康复计划对长期感染新冠病毒的成年人的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Trial-investigates-efficacy-of-online-supervised-group-mental-and-physical-rehabilitation-program-for-long-COVID-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Trial-investigates-efficacy-of-online-supervised-group-mental-and-physical-rehabilitation-program-for-long-COVID-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39048647-7cc6-478e-b79a-6cbc308de82f Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:13:00 -0500 Trial investigates efficacy of online supervised group mental and physical rehabilitation program for long COVID patients
早教和托儿中心提供的膳食不符合国家饮食建议昆士兰大学的研究人员发现，一些社会经济地位较低的社区的早期教育和儿童保育中心提供的膳食不符合国家饮食建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Meals-provided-in-early-education-and-childcare-centers-do-not-meet-national-dietary-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Meals-provided-in-early-education-and-childcare-centers-do-not-meet-national-dietary-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461a210d-7c57-4d48-bc8e-c8a582f8ab40 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 11:06:26 -0500 Meals provided in early education and childcare centers do not meet national dietary recommendations
新研究可能解释为什么早产儿的肺部对压力敏感许多早产儿需要机械通气来呼吸。然而，长时间通气可能会导致呼吸系统疾病或通气引起的损伤等问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-research-may-explain-why-premature-lungs-are-sensitive-to-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/New-research-may-explain-why-premature-lungs-are-sensitive-to-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfeed1bf-9a96-4e27-a9d1-02b989e82c22 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 10:00:42 -0500 New research may explain why premature lungs are sensitive to stress
